H0.text: Collide is what reactants may not do when they are present in such low concentrations that it is unlikely they will meet.

H1.text: Explode is the action that reactants may fail to perform when they are present in such low concentrations that it is unlikely they will meet.

H2.text: Depart is the action that reactants may take when they are present in such low concentrations that it is unlikely they will meet.

H3.text: Melt is the action that is unlikely to occur when reactants are present in such low concentrations that they are unlikely to meet.

A4.text: Increasing the concentration of the reactant brings about more collisions and hence more successful collisions.
